mapper.select: SELECT TEAM_NAME, TEAM_LOCAL FROM TEAM_INFO GROUP BY TEAM_NAME, TEAM_LOCAL
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TEAM_INFO ( TEAM_INFO_SEQ, TEAM_ID, LEADER_ID, TEAM_NAME, TEAM_NUMBER, TEAM_GENDER, TEAM_LOCAL, TEAM_INTRO, TEAM_AGE, TEAM_FORMATION, TEAM_LEVEL, TEAM_DAY, TEAM_TIME, TEAM_COLOR, TEAM_TYPE ) VALUES( TEAM_INFO_SEQ.NEXTVAL, (SELECT NVL(MAX(TEAM_ID), 0) + 1 FROM TEAM_INFO), #{leaderId}, #{teamName}, #{teamNumber} + 1, #{teamGender}, #{teamLocal}, #{teamIntro}, #{teamAge}, #{teamFormation}, #{teamLevel}, #{teamDay}, #{teamTime}, #{teamColor}, 'Leader' )

INSERT INTO TEAM ( TEAM_SEQNO, TEAM_NAME, TEAM_NUMBER, TEAM_GENDER, TEAM_LOCAL, TEAM_START_DATE, TEAM_END_DATE, TEAM_STATUS, TEAM_OTHER, TEAM_LEVEL, TEAM_AGE, TEAM_DAY, TEAM_TIME, LEADER_ID ) VALUES( TEAM_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{teamName}, #{teamNumber}, #{teamGender}, #{teamLocal}, #{teamStartDate}, #{teamEndDate}, '모집 중', #{teamOther}, #{teamLevel}, #{teamAge}, #{teamDay}, #{teamTime}, #{leaderId} )

UPDATE TEAM SET TEAM_NUMBER = #{teamNumber}, TEAM_GENDER = #{teamGender}, TEAM_END_DATE = #{teamEndDate}, TEAM_STATUS = #{teamStatus}, TEAM_OTHER = #{teamOther}, TEAM_AGE = #{teamAge} WHERE TEAM_SEQNO = #{teamSeqNo}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM TEAM_INFO WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{userId} OR LEADER_ID = #{userId}

SELECT T.TEAM_TYPE, U.USER_NAME, U.USER_MAIN_POSITION, U.USER_SUB_POSITION, U.USER_GENDER, U.USER_ID, T.LEADER_ID FROM USERS U JOIN TEAM_INFO T ON (T.MEMBER_ID = U.USER_ID) OR (T.LEADER_ID = U.USER_ID) WHERE T.TEAM_ID = #{teamId} ORDER BY T.TEAM_INFO_SEQ ASC
SELECT * FROM TEAM_INFO WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{userId} OR LEADER_ID = #{userId}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM TEAM_INFO WHERE MEMBER_ID IN ( SELECT USER_ID FROM USERS WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}) OR LEADER_ID IN ( SELECT USER_ID FROM USERS WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM TEAM_INFO ORDER BY TEAM_RANK ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TEAM_APPLY ( TEAM_APPLY_NO, TEAM_ID, USER_ID, APPLY_OTHER, USER_NAME, USER_GENDER, USER_PHONE_NUMBER, USER_POSITION ) VALUES( TEAM_APPLY_NO.NEXTVAL, #{teamId}, #{userId}, #{applyOther}, #{userName}, #{userGender}, #{userPhoneNumber}, #{userPosition} )
